articles.author: Rebecca Falconer
articles.title: World leaders call for calm after India strikes Pakistan following attack in Kashmir - Axios
articles.description: India's military said it struck 9 in response to a deadly attack by gunmen in Indian-administered Kashmir.
articles.content:
President Trump and other world leaders called for an end to India-Pakistan hostilities after the Indian military launched deadly strikes on Pakistani targets early Wednesday local time.

articles.title: UK and India sign a ‘landmark’ trade agreement after years of tough negotiations - AP News
articles.description: Britain and India have agreed on a hard-wrought free trade agreement that will reduce or eliminate tariffs on Scotch whisky and scores of other products. The deal announced Tuesday comes more than three years after negotiations started — and stalled — under a…
articles.content: LONDON (AP) Britain and India announced Tuesday that they have agreed on a hard-wrought free trade agreement that will slash tariffs on products including Scotch whisky and English gin shipped to Ind… [+3860 chars]
